name: RetroBox
description: RetroBox is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its unique combination of vintage console aesthetics and advanced technology, RetroBox brings a nostalgic charm to the world of robotics. Its sturdy soldier buttons and robust foundry arms and legs make it a reliable companion in any situation. The red and black screen adds a touch of old-school flair, while the helmet addon enhances RetroBox's functionality and protects its circuitry from external interferences.
